title: The Matrix - Reality or Simulation?
description: Test your knowledge about the Wachowskis' groundbreaking sci-fi masterpiece. Minor spoilers ahead!

questions.question: What is Neo's real name in the Matrix?
questions.explanation: Thomas A. Anderson is Neo's name in the simulated reality before he discovers the truth.

questions.question: What color pill does Neo take to leave the Matrix?
questions.explanation: Neo takes the red pill to see reality, while the blue pill would return him to ignorance.

questions.question: Who is the captain of the Nebuchadnezzar?
questions.explanation: Morpheus captains the hovercraft Nebuchadnezzar and leads the crew against the machines.

questions.question: What is the name of the traitor who betrays the crew?
questions.explanation: Cypher betrays the crew to Agent Smith in exchange for being reinserted into the Matrix.

questions.question: What martial art style is primarily featured in the film?
questions.explanation: Kung Fu is the primary martial art style, choreographed by Yuen Woo-ping.

questions.question: What year was The Matrix released?
questions.explanation: The Matrix premiered in March 1999 and became an instant cultural phenomenon.

questions.question: Which actress plays Trinity?
questions.explanation: Carrie-Anne Moss portrays Trinity, the skilled hacker and Neo's ally.

questions.question: What do humans represent to the machines in the Matrix?
questions.explanation: Humans are used as batteries to power the machines after blocking out the sun.

questions.question: What is the name of the last human city?
questions.explanation: Zion is the underground city where the last free humans survive.

questions.question: What ability does Neo develop by the end of the film?
questions.explanation: Neo realizes he is The One and can manipulate the Matrix, including stopping bullets mid-air.
